javaapplication4

Class Sale

  • java.lang.Object
    • javaapplication4.Sale
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiscountSale

    public class Sale
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for a simple sale of one item with no tax, discount, or other adjustments. Class invariant: The price is always nonnegative; the name is a nonempty string.
